content: the elbows up shorty socks are worked top down from the cuff toward the toes and use german short row to shape the heels the ankle design uses stranded colourwork follwing a charted pattern **sizing ** sock circumference xs 16cm / s 18 cm / m 20 cm / l 22 cm / xl 24 cm the socks have about 20% of positive ease for a regular fit choose the size with a circumference 2-3 cm smaller than the wearer s foot and for a tighter fit choose one size smaller **yarn ** in the spirit of this pattern we recommend supporting your favourite canadian yarn store yarn producer or independent yarn dyer if you are able use any fingering weight 80% superwash merino / 20% nylon yarn with a length to weight ratio of approximately 200 m / 50 g for sizes xs s m l xl you will need approximately main colour white 110 145 190 250 300 m contrasting colour red 60 80 100 135 160 m **gauge ** gauge using 2 5 mm dpns 32 sts and 40 row in stockinette st over 10 cm both horizontally and vertically knit in the round and blocked **copyright ** *patterns and photos property of songsparrow knits and are downloaded under the agreement that no part of the written pattern charts or photos will be distributed copied in part or in whole re-written or sold without explicit written permission finished products created by you using the pattern may be sold however we ask that you give the pattern author credit * thank you
